name: Bob and Dmitri
description:
Bobby is stuck in a world full of filthy monsters and he probably can't beat them alone. But luckily he is not alone, his pal Dmitri has got him covered. How long can you stay alive with ya boy Dmitri ?

Known Bugs
  • DO NOT ENTER THE HELP MENU!!! I somehow screwed up when I was in a hurry and deleted the back button.
  • Screen shake doesn't work after reloading game
Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

LMB - Shoot

Space - Activate Dmitri ( when available)
